explanation: Agar aapka transfer ho chuka hai, toh please 'Herbal Gulal' hi use karein. Chemical colors skin se absorb hokar nuksan kar sakte hain.
next_steps: Pani wali Holi avoid karein (fisalne/slip hone ka darr rehta hai).
reassurance: Thoda tika lagana safe hai. Enjoy the sweets!

explanation: If you are stimulating or pregnant, strict fasting (Upvas) is NOT recommended. Acidity and dehydration trigger nausea.
next_steps: You can eat 'Phalahar' (Fruits/Sabudana) frequently. Do not stay empty stomach for >3 hours.

explanation: You asked if being Vegetarian reduces IVF success. No, it doesn't, BUT you need to work harder for protein.
next_steps: Since you don't eat eggs/chicken, please add Paneer, Tofu, Soya chunks, and Sprouts to *every* meal.
reassurance: We can add a protein powder supplement if needed.

explanation: Kya Auto-Rickshaw mein travel karna safe hai? Haan, par khadde (potholes) se bachein.
next_steps: Driver ko dhire chalane ko bolein.
reassurance: Uterus mein baby bubble wrap jaisa safe hota hai. Jhatke se nahi girta.

explanation: You are worried about hiding injections from in-laws. We can switch your protocol to 'Clinic Injections' only.
next_steps: You can come here daily for the shot, so no meds are kept in your fridge at home.
reassurance: We will mark the file 'Confidential - Do not call landline'.

explanation: You are the designated 'Nurse' tonight! Watch the video on how to mix Menopur.
next_steps: Wash hands, pinch her skin gently, inject slowly.
reassurance: Your involvement statistically lowers her stress levels.

explanation: As per ART Act 2021, Aadhaar card of both partners is mandatory for creating embryos.
next_steps: Please WhatsApp photos of front/back today.
reassurance: Data is uploaded to National Registry (secure).

explanation: The new law requires you to purchase 36 months of health insurance for the surrogate mother.
next_steps: We have a tie-up with an insurance agent who handles ART specific policies.
reassurance: This covers any complications she might face.

explanation: Agar aap bed rest par hain (bleeding ki wajah se), toh maid ko samjha dein ki heavy saman aapko na uthana pade.
next_steps: Jhadu-pocha avoid karein (bending).

explanation: Spicy food causes acidity/heartburn which is worse during pregnancy, but it does NOT harm the baby.
next_steps: If you crave spice, eat it in moderation.
reassurance: The uterus is protected from your stomach contents.

explanation: We need your best sample next week. Alcohol reduces sperm motility within 24 hours.
next_steps: Please abstain from drinking for 5 days before pickup.
reassurance: It makes a difference in fertilization rates.

explanation: Please leave your phone in the locker during Egg Pickup.
next_steps: Set an 'Out of Office' message for 4 hours.
reassurance: The sedation makes you groggy; you shouldn't talk to your boss anyway!

explanation: Please trim/shave private area before coming for Egg Retrieval.
next_steps: It reduces infection risk during the procedure.
reassurance: Do not use hair removal cream (chemical burns risk).

explanation: Procedure se pehle private part clean (shave/trim) karke aayein.
next_steps: Ye infection se bachne ke liye zaroori hai.

explanation: Remove all jewelry (rings/bangles/mangalsutra) before OT admission.
next_steps: Leave valuables at home.

explanation: Please remove nail polish from at least one finger.
next_steps: We need to put the 'Pulse Oximeter' clip on your finger to check oxygen during surgery.

explanation: Clinic mein sample dene mein awkward lag sakta hai. Humare pass private room with magazines/video hai.
next_steps: Agar aap ghar se sample lana chahte hain (within 45 mins), toh container le jayein.
reassurance: Ye bohot common hai, stress na lein.

explanation: Transferring husband's frozen sample from another city?
next_steps: Use 'Cryo-Ship' service. Do NOT carry in dry ice yourself on flight (Airport security won't allow).
reassurance: We will coordinate with the courier company.

explanation: Day 8 of 14. This is the hardest part. Stop staring at the calendar!
next_steps: Task for today: Watch a comedy movie or cook a new recipe.
reassurance: Laughter increases blood flow. Anxiety constricts it.

explanation: Aapne puchha tha Mandir ka Vibhuti/Prasad kha sakte hain? Haan, bilkul.
next_steps: Positive energy hamesha achhi hoti hai.

explanation: Asking for gender of embryo/fetus is a CRIME under PCPNDT Act.
next_steps: Punishable by jail for patient and doctor.

explanation: You want twins, but medically, a singleton is safer. Twins have high risk of preterm birth and NICU stay.
next_steps: I strongly advise Single Embryo Transfer (SET) given your height/weight.
reassurance: One healthy baby is better than two premature ones.

explanation: Are you taking antibiotics for fever/infection? Some affect sperm motility.
next_steps: Let us know the name of the drug.
reassurance: We might need to delay pickup by a few days.

explanation: You can drive a car after transfer. Avoid two-wheelers (Scooty) on bad roads if possible due to bumps.
next_steps: Wear seatbelt - it protects you and the tummy.

explanation: Scooty chalana thoda risky ho sakta hai agar road kharab ho (jhatke lagte hain). Car chalana safe hai.
next_steps: Agar possible ho toh 2 weeks ke liye driver le lein.

explanation: Now that you are pregnant, take the Flu Shot and Tetanus (TT) as per schedule.
next_steps: Safe in pregnancy.

explanation: Dengue fever is dangerous in pregnancy. Use All-Out or Odomos.
next_steps: It is safe to apply on skin.

explanation: Indian toilet use karna safe hai? Haan, squatting se embryo nahi girta.
next_steps: Bas pair fisalne ka dhyaan rakhein.
reassurance: Agar Western toilet hai toh wo zyada comfortable rahega.

explanation: Squatting (Indian toilet) puts no pressure on the uterus cavity.
next_steps: Use whatever you are used to.

explanation: Even if you smoke on the balcony, the smoke particles stick to your clothes and affect your pregnant wife.
next_steps: Second-hand smoke causes low birth weight.
reassurance: Please shower/change clothes before hugging her.

explanation: Badam aur Akhrot (Walnuts) daily khayein. Inme Omega-3 hota hai.
next_steps: Raat ko bhigo kar subah khayein.
reassurance: Brain development ke liye best hai.

explanation: Traveling to a different time zone? Keep the injection interval 24 hours.
next_steps: Adjust time gradually.
reassurance: Call us to calculate the new time.

explanation: Refund for cancelled cycle processed: ‚Çπ{{amount}}.
next_steps: Check bank account in 3 days.

explanation: Download our Clinic App to see all reports.
next_steps: User: {{patient_id}} Pass: {{dob}}

explanation: Avoid heavy smoke from firecrackers. Pollution increases inflammation.
next_steps: Stay indoors or wear N95 mask.

explanation: Anesthesia slows down the gut. Constipation is normal for 2 days.
next_steps: Eat papaya.

explanation: You have fever today? We cannot use fresh sperm if fever >100F.
next_steps: We will use your frozen backup sample.
reassurance: Good thing we froze it last month!

explanation: You are still breastfeeding your first child? Prolactin levels will be high.
next_steps: You must wean completely before we start the next IVF stimulation.
reassurance: Meds pass through milk, so weaning is safer.

explanation: Aapke pass Gonal-F bach gaya hai? Hum wapis nahi le sakte (rules).
next_steps: Aap kisi needy patient ko donate kar sakte hain clinic mein.

explanation: If you are happy with our service, please review us.
next_steps: Helps others find us.

explanation: Enjoy your baby shower! Send us photos.
next_steps: Don't get too tired standing.

explanation: For your surrogate baby, we need to apply for the passport immediately after birth.
next_steps: We will provide the birth certificate and DNA test proof.

explanation: We have uploaded your injection calendar to the app.
next_steps: Check dates.

explanation: Please save our Night Emergency Number: {{emergency_phone}}.
next_steps: Star it in your contacts.

explanation: Humara safar yahan khatam hota hai. Aap parents ban gaye!
next_steps: Zindagi bhar ki khushiyan mubarak ho.
